title: Goodyear Microfibre Dusting Cloth I Specially designed microfibre cloth for windscreens, windows and mirrors | Statically charged cleaning fibres attract dust | Leaves a lint free finish | 60m x 40cm
availability_text: Only 5 left in stock (more on the way).
features: Advanced Microfibre Technology: The Goodyear Microfibre Dusting Cloth utilizes cutting-edge microfibre technology to deliver outstanding cleaning results. The specially designed fibres are engineered to be highly effective at trapping dust, dirt, and grime, ensuring a thorough clean without the need for harsh chemicals or excessive scrubbing.

Statically Charged Cleaning Fibres: The cloth features statically charged fibres that naturally attract and hold dust particles, making it incredibly efficient at dusting surfaces. This unique property allows you to clean more effectively, leaving your surfaces looking pristine and free from dust and debris.

Lint-Free and Streak-Free Finish: Say goodbye to annoying lint and streaks with this premium microfibre cloth. The high-density weave ensures a smooth, streak-free finish on all glass surfaces, enhancing visibility and leaving your windscreens, windows, and mirrors crystal clear.

Durable and Long-Lasting: Built to withstand repeated use, the Goodyear Microfibre Dusting Cloth is durable and long-lasting. It can be machine washed and reused multiple times, maintaining its effectiveness and saving you money on disposable cleaning products.

Generous Size for Versatile Use: Measuring 60cm x 40cm, this large microfibre cloth provides ample coverage for a variety of cleaning tasks. Whether you're tackling large windscreen surfaces or smaller mirrors and windows, the generous size allows for efficient and effortless cleaning.
description: The Goodyear Microfibre Dusting Cloth Large is an essential tool for achieving crystal clear clarity on windscreens, windows, and mirrors. Specially designed with advanced microfibre technology, this cloth is engineered to deliver exceptional cleaning power. The statically charged cleaning fibers attract and capture dust, dirt, and debris with ease, ensuring a thorough clean every time. Measuring a generous 60cm x 40cm, it provides ample coverage, making it ideal for large surfaces and ensuring you can tackle any cleaning task with confidence. The ultra-soft microfibre material is gentle on surfaces, preventing scratches and leaving a streak-free, lint-free finish that enhances visibility and appearance. This versatile cleaning cloth is perfect for use both inside and outside the car, as well as around the home. Its superior absorbency makes it excellent for wiping away condensation and smudges, while its durability ensures it can be washed and reused time and again without losing effectiveness. Whether you're detailing your vehicle or sprucing up household glass surfaces, the Goodyear Microfibre Dusting Cloth Large is your go-to solution for a spotless shine. Trust in the quality and reliability of Goodyear, a brand renowned for its dedication to performance and excellence. Invest in this high-performance cleaning cloth and experience the difference in cleanliness and clarity.
